mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book( bookName, language, area, sharedType, createTime, createId, remark )VALUES( #{bookName}, #{language}, #{area}, #{sharedType}, #{createTime}, #{createId}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE book set bookName=#{bookName}, language=#{language}, area=#{area}, sharedType=#{sharedType}, remark=#{remark}, updateTime=#{updateTime}, updateId=#{updateId} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from book t where t.id=#{bookId}
select t.id , t.bookName, t.area, t.`language`, t.sharedType, t.createId, t.remark, t.updateDetailTime, a.username AS createName from book t ,userinfo a where t.createId=a.id and t.id=#{bookId}

select t.id , t.bookName, t.area, t.`language`, t.sharedType, t.createId, t.updateDetailTime, a.remark, a.progress, a.lastTime, b.username AS createName from book t ,userbook a,userinfo b where a.bookId=t.id and t.createId=b.id and a.userId=#{userId}
select t.id , t.bookName, t.area, t.`language`, t.sharedType, t.createId, t.remark, t.updateDetailTime, a.username AS createName from book t ,userinfo a where sharedType=1 AND t.createId=a.id
SELECT t.id,t.pointName,t.chapterId,t.number,t.bookId ,t.sort,t.chapterSort FROM point t WHERE t.bookId=#{bookId}
SELECT COUNT(*) progress FROM pointExerciseDetail t WHERE t.userId=#{userId} AND t.bookId=#{bookId}
SELECT COUNT(*) progress FROM pointExerciseDetail t WHERE t.userId=#{userId} AND t.bookId=#{bookId} AND t.exerciseNumber>0
SELECT a.* FROM book a ,point b ,card c WHERE c.pointId=b.id AND b.bookId=a.id AND c.id=#{cardId}
